assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vestum AB (publ) engages in the infrastructure, water, and service businesses in Sweden and internationally. The company offers maintenance and sludge removal services; various pumps, ventilation products, gears, generators, electric motors, gearbox and transmission products, and related equipment; electro engineering and automation services; pressure vessels; fans and blowers; repair and maintenance services for pumps and pumping stations; prefabricated pumping stations; manufacturing and repair services for industrial electronics; sealing and maintenance products; filters and water treatment equipment; and rewinding, repairing, and services for electrical motors, pumps, transformators, power generators, cranes, handheld power tools, and others. It also provides monitoring and maintenance services for pumps; renovation services for old pumps or pump systems; brand-new installation services; irrigation solutions; and installation services for machine, HVAC, wastewater, and ventilation works. The company offers aluminum sections, elevators, firefighting equipment, safety gears and training materials, glass and climate control products, glass and facade sections, roof covering, ceilings and acoustics, and water proofing; and electrical and plumbing installation, demolition, remediation and hole-drilling, roof safety work and painting, and snow removal services, as well as pipe and ventilation, and other insulation services; and works related to ground and concrete for infrastructure projects. It also provides perimeter protection security solutions, concrete beams, and heat insulation and drainage products; and construction works, container rental services, weather protections, ground and waterproofing works, fiber optic networks, and railway and public transport projects. The company was formerly known as WeSC AB (publ) and changed its name to Vestum AB (publ) in June 2021. Vestum AB (publ) was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
